clusters.representative_ac_text: Authentication via email and password.
ac_texts: Authentication via email and password.

clusters.representative_ac_text: Email address must be unique within the system.
ac_texts: Email address must be unique within the system.

clusters.representative_ac_text: Implement email format validation.
ac_texts: Implement email format validation.

clusters.representative_ac_text: Corporate domain restrictions must be configurable.
ac_texts: Corporate domain restrictions must be configurable.

clusters.representative_ac_text: Authentication fails for non-existent email addresses.
ac_texts: Authentication fails for non-existent email addresses.

clusters.representative_ac_text: Passwords must be compared using hash values.
ac_texts: Passwords must be compared using hash values.
Passwords must be stored using bcrypt or equivalent/stronger algorithms.

clusters.representative_ac_text: Password comparison must use constant-time algorithms (Anti-timing attack).
ac_texts: Password comparison must use constant-time algorithms (Anti-timing attack).

clusters.representative_ac_text: Hashes must include a salt.
ac_texts: Hashes must include a salt.

clusters.representative_ac_text: Plain text passwords must not be output to DB, logs, or responses.
ac_texts: Plain text passwords must not be output to DB, logs, or responses.

clusters.representative_ac_text: Passwords must be at least 8 characters long.
ac_texts: Passwords must be at least 8 characters long.

clusters.representative_ac_text: Configurable rules for combinations of uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and symbols.
ac_texts: Configurable rules for combinations of uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and symbols.

clusters.representative_ac_text: Password input fields must be masked.
ac_texts: Password input fields must be masked.

clusters.representative_ac_text: Account lockout after 5 consecutive failed attempts.
ac_texts: Account lockout after 5 consecutive failed attempts.

clusters.representative_ac_text: Lockout duration is configurable (Initial: 30 minutes).
ac_texts: Lockout duration is configurable (Initial: 30 minutes).

clusters.representative_ac_text: Locked accounts cannot be authenticated.
ac_texts: Locked accounts cannot be authenticated.

clusters.representative_ac_text: Unlockable only by administrators.
ac_texts: Unlockable only by administrators.

clusters.representative_ac_text: Security logs generated upon lockout events.
ac_texts: Security logs generated upon lockout events.

clusters.representative_ac_text: Brute-force alerts for excessive attempts from a single IP.
ac_texts: Brute-force alerts for excessive attempts from a single IP.

clusters.representative_ac_text: Issue a JWT upon successful authentication.
ac_texts: Issue a JWT upon successful authentication.

clusters.representative_ac_text: JWT must contain user_id, role, and expiration date.
ac_texts: JWT must contain user_id, role, and expiration date.
JWT must be signed.

clusters.representative_ac_text: Token signature verification is mandatory.
ac_texts: Token signature verification is mandatory.

clusters.representative_ac_text: Invalid or tampered tokens must be rejected.
ac_texts: Invalid or tampered tokens must be rejected.

clusters.representative_ac_text: JWT expiration is configurable (Initial: 60 minutes).
ac_texts: JWT expiration is configurable (Initial: 60 minutes).

clusters.representative_ac_text: Tokens must only be transmitted over HTTPS.
ac_texts: Tokens must only be transmitted over HTTPS.

clusters.representative_ac_text: Secure attribute must be set when using cookies.
ac_texts: Secure attribute must be set when using cookies.
HttpOnly attribute must be set when using cookies.

clusters.representative_ac_text: SameSite attribute must be set.
ac_texts: SameSite attribute must be set.

clusters.representative_ac_text: CSRF protection tokens are mandatory.
ac_texts: CSRF protection tokens are mandatory.

clusters.representative_ac_text: Anti-session fixation measures must be implemented.
ac_texts: Anti-session fixation measures must be implemented.

clusters.representative_ac_text: Use parameterized queries/ORM against SQL injection.
ac_texts: Use parameterized queries/ORM against SQL injection.

clusters.representative_ac_text: Sanitize input values (Anti-XSS).
ac_texts: Sanitize input values (Anti-XSS).

clusters.representative_ac_text: Store logs for successful logins.
ac_texts: Store logs for successful logins.
Store logs for failed logins.

clusters.representative_ac_text: Logs include user_id, IP, User-Agent, and timestamp.
ac_texts: Logs include user_id, IP, User-Agent, and timestamp.

clusters.representative_ac_text: Logs must be stored in tamper-evident storage.
ac_texts: Logs must be stored in tamper-evident storage.

clusters.representative_ac_text: Log retention period must be configurable.
ac_texts: Log retention period must be configurable.

clusters.representative_ac_text: Apply rate limiting to the login API.
ac_texts: Apply rate limiting to the login API.

clusters.representative_ac_text: Return HTTP 429 when rate limit is exceeded.
ac_texts: Return HTTP 429 when rate limit is exceeded.

clusters.representative_ac_text: Authentication process must support asynchronous I/O.
ac_texts: Authentication process must support asynchronous I/O.

clusters.representative_ac_text: Target response time for login API is within 200ms.
ac_texts: Target response time for login API is within 200ms.

clusters.representative_ac_text: Error responses must not reveal internal system information.
ac_texts: Error responses must not reveal internal system information.

clusters.representative_ac_text: Transition to business screens only upon successful authentication.
ac_texts: Transition to business screens only upon successful authentication.

clusters.representative_ac_text: Initial screen branching based on role permissions.
ac_texts: Initial screen branching based on role permissions.

clusters.representative_ac_text: Login state maintained until token expiration.
ac_texts: Login state maintained until token expiration.

clusters.representative_ac_text: Invalidate tokens upon logout.
ac_texts: Invalidate tokens upon logout.

clusters.representative_ac_text: Invalidated tokens managed via a blacklist (Redis).
ac_texts: Invalidated tokens managed via a blacklist (Redis).
